descriptionHtml:
[size=4]This mod will replace your main menu with lannister theme and Rains of Castamere theme music
Insturmental version and randomiser will be added

There are with and without music options available[/size]

[color=#00ff00]  Installation[/color]
[size=2] Uninstall if you're using any other main menu replacer then [/size]
[size=2] Simply use NMM to install[/size]
[size=2]         or [/size]
[size=2] Drag and drop files to the skyrim data folder[/size]
[color=#ff0000]  Warning[/color]
 [b][size=2]Menu colors can be affected by mods like ENB which can cause main graphic to change colors, etc.
[color=#ffff00]
[/color][/size][/b][color=#ffff00]I do not own and i have no right on artwork and music used on this mod

[youtube]mn0HaQAXaRc[/youtube][/color]
author: Chrollo

files.name: House Lannister theme with no music
